檢送: forward;present (平行單位間);Please find as attached.;Please see attachment(s).

檢陳: submit (下級單位對上級單位);Please find as attached.;Please see attachment(s).

特派: appoint (someone) as a special envoy;(specially) appoint;designate (someone) as a chargé d'affaires

鈞長: you;We respectfully request that you review this project.;The +(職稱);We are pleased to inform the Director-General that …

敬請鈞長卓參。: We respectfully request your consideration of this matter.;Please kindly consider this matter.

陳請鈞長鑒核。: Please review and instruct. ; (This) will be at your discretion. ;Please kindly review this matter and render/convey your decision. ;Please advise us of your decision.

奉悉: Receipt of xxx is respectfully acknowledged.

已悉: Receipt of xxx is hereby acknowledged.

依據 (稱謂)...辦理: xxx (be) carried out in accordance with yyy

計達: This is further to xxx. ;This is to follow up on xxx.

遵經、遵即、遵查、旋即、旋經: Per your instruction, we promptly xxx.

案經、業經、已經、爰經、嗣經: Per your xxx, we have already yyy. ;Per your instruction/request, we have xxx.

甫經、頃經: Per your xxx, we have just recently yyy.

均經、並經: We have completed the above items. ;xxx have been carried out.

迭經、歷經、續經: We have repeatedly attempted to xxx.

俟經: Having carried out xxx, we yyy.

應予檢討: xxx needs to be reviewed and rectified.

應切實檢討: xxx must be reviewed and rectified.

應切實檢討改進: xxx must be reviewed and improved.

同意照辦: We agree and will act accordingly.;Regarding … , we agree and will act accordingly.

歉難同意、未便照辦: Regretfully, we cannot agree and are unable to act accordingly.

歉難同意、無法照辦: regretfully, cannot approve;We regret to inform you that xxx cannot be approved.

請核示、請鈞閱、請核閱: Please review and instruct. ; (This) will be at your discretion. ;Please kindly review this matter and render/offer/convey your decision. ;Please advise us of your decision. ;

請核轉: Kindly approve and submit to ***.;Kindly approve and forward.

請查照見復: Please act as needed and reply. ;Please take note and reply.

請查明見復: Please look into this and reply.

請查照辦理見復: Please act as needed and reply.

請查照備案: Please take note and retain on file.

請查照轉知: Please take note and forward. ;Please take note and notify ***.

希查照: Please take note and act as needed.

請轉行照辦: Please circulate and ensure compliance. ;Please circulate and make sure everyone acts accordingly.

請鑒核: Kindly review this and convey your decision.

檢送、檢附、附、附送: Please see attachment. (電郵) ;Please find attached. (電郵/書面);Please see the enclosed. (書面郵件)

是否可行，請核示: Please advise if this is acceptable/feasible.

核與…相符: confirmed as complying with xxx;confirmed to comply with xxx

建請惠予變更機密等級: Regarding…, please change the level of classification.

案屬貴管，移請卓辦: As this matter falls within your jurisdiction/authority, it is hereby forwarded for your attention.

擬具修正草案: Proposal of amendment to xxx;Proposed amendment of xxx

轉陳: kindly forward to xxx ;to be forwarded to xxx

報核後頒行: to be announced for implementation upon approval

分行各相關機關辦理: notify all relevant agencies to implement (this) accordingly;notify all relevant agencies to act upon this accordingly;to be issued to relevant agencies for implementation;for notification to the relevant agencies for implementation

上簽呈: submit a request for approval;submit a proposal for approval;submit an official request

至紉公誼: (Your assistance/xxx) is highly appreciated. ;(Your assistance/xxx) would be highly appreciated.

自公布日施行: shall become effective from the date of promulgation/announcement;shall take effect from the date of promulgation/announcement

簽稿併陳: We hereby submit this proposal and draft plan.

敬悉: Receipt of xxx is hereby acknowledged.

諒達: This is further to xxx. ;This is to follow up on xxx.

諒蒙鈞察: This is further to xxx. ;This is to follow up on xxx.

請核示: Please review and instruct. ; (This) will be at your discretion. ;Please kindly review this matter and render/offer/convey your decision. ;Please advise us of your decision. ;

請鑒核: Please review and instruct. ; (This) will be at your discretion. ;Please kindly review this matter and render/offer/convey your decision. ;Please advise us of your decision. ;

請查照: Please take note and act as needed.

附陳、檢陳: Please see attachment. (電郵) ;Please find attached. (電郵/書面);Please see the enclosed. (書面郵件)
